title: You can snag lifetime access to Microsoft Office 2019 for Windows and Mac for under $30
content:
Macworld

If you’re tired of overpaying for productivity apps with recurring fees or simply need to invest in reliable tools for work, this Microsoft Office deal comes at the perfect time. For a limited time, you can snag Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac or Windows for less than $30, a nearly $200 discount from the retail price of $229. 

While this isn’t the latest iteration of Microsoft Office, this 2019 edition might play better with older or refurbished devices, all while offering many similar apps you’d find in the newest version with absolutely no subscription fees.

Both Mac and Windows users will get the 2019 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Outlook. The Windows license additional provides Publisher and Access 2019, while the Mac license offers Teams Classic 2019.

Upon purchase, you’ll get a downloadable link and license keys with instant redemption. Of course, you’ll need to ensure your OS meets system requirements — Mac users should have Monterey Version 12, while Windows users should have Windows 10 or 11. Another important note is that each license will connect with your Microsoft account rather than your device.

Improve your productivity with tools designed for success. For a limited time, you can grab:

  • Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac for just $29.97.
  • Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows for just $29.97.

 

Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac and Windows

Only $29.97 at Macworld

StackSocial prices subject to change.
